    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ChainedCreateReplicationSlotBuilder createReplicationSlot()
      Create replication slot, that can be next use in PGReplicationConnection.replicationStream() Replication slots provide an automated way to ensure that the master does not remove WAL segments until they have been received by all standbys, and that the master does not remove rows which could cause a recovery conflict even when the standby is disconnected.
      void dropReplicationSlot(String slotName) 
      ChainedStreamBuilder replicationStream()
      After start replication stream this connection not available to use for another queries until replication stream will not close.

    • 方法详细资料

      • replicationStream

        public ChainedStreamBuilder replicationStream()
        从接口复制的说明: PGReplicationConnection
        After start replication stream this connection not available to use for another queries until replication stream will not close.
        指定者:
        replicationStream 在接口中 PGReplicationConnection
        返回:
        not null fluent api for build replication stream

      • createReplicationSlot

        public ChainedCreateReplicationSlotBuilder createReplicationSlot()
        从接口复制的说明: PGReplicationConnection

        Create replication slot, that can be next use in PGReplicationConnection.replicationStream()

        Replication slots provide an automated way to ensure that the master does not remove WAL segments until they have been received by all standbys, and that the master does not remove rows which could cause a recovery conflict even when the standby is disconnected.

        指定者:
        createReplicationSlot 在接口中 PGReplicationConnection
        返回:
        not null fluent api for build create replication slot

      • dropReplicationSlot

        public void dropReplicationSlot(String slotName)
                         throws SQLException
        指定者:
        dropReplicationSlot 在接口中 PGReplicationConnection
        参数:
        slotName - not null replication slot name exists in database that should be drop
        抛出:
        SQLException
